entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Greenstone (Geraldton)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:41 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -21.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Geraldton Airport 10:41 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow

Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -25.7°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 18.
